history.title: Our History
history.subtitle: A Decade of Impact & Resilience
history.intro: Founded in 2012, Alternatives Ménages, Nature et Marchés (AMEN) began as a grassroots initiative to support rural households in the Congo Basin. What started as a small group of volunteers has grown into a recognized organization driving sustainable development across the region.
history.journey: Our journey has been defined by resilience, partnership, and an unwavering commitment to the communities we serve. We believe in local solutions for local challenges.

milestones.2012: Foundation of AMEN as a local initiative.

history.milestonesDesc: Key moments that defined our journey.

visionMission.title: Vision & Mission
visionMission.subtitle: Guiding Our Path forward
visionMission.visionText: A world where communities live in harmony with nature, enjoying food security, economic dignity, and social justice, free from the shackles of poverty.
visionMission.missionText: To empower vulnerable households by strengthening their economic capacities, promoting sustainable agriculture, and protecting the environment, while ensuring equitable access to markets.
visionMission.natureDesc: Working hand in hand to restore balance and provide sustainable futures.

objectives.title: Our Objectives
objectives.subtitle: Tangible Goals for Sustainable Change
objectives.intro: We are committed to achieving concrete results that improve lives and protect our planet.

1.title: Food Security
1.desc: Ensure access to sufficient, safe, and nutritious food for all.

2.title: Economic Empowerment
2.desc: Create income-generating opportunities for women and youth.

3.title: Environmental Sustainability
3.desc: Promote practices that conserve natural resources and biodiversity.

4.title: Social Justice
4.desc: Advocate for the rights and dignity of marginalized groups.

governance.title: Governance & Organization
governance.subtitle: Leadership with Integrity

aboutSection.title: We Are Here To Help
aboutSection.description: AMEN (Alternatives Ménages, Nature et Marchés) is a non-profit organization committed to creating sustainable change. We focus on empowering vulnerable households, protecting our natural environment, and fostering fair market access for small producers.

programs.title: Check Our Popular Causes
programs.description: We focus on the most critical needs of our communities. From clean water to education, your support makes a direct impact.

womenEmpowerment.title: Women Empowerment
womenEmpowerment.description: Supporting women through vocational training and micro-finance initiatives to build sustainable livelihoods.

environmentalProtection.title: Environmental Protection
environmentalProtection.description: Reforestation projects and sustainable agriculture workshops to combat climate change and preserve biodiversity.

cleanWater.title: Clean Water Access
cleanWater.description: Installing wells and water purification systems in remote villages to ensure access to safe drinking water.

article1.excerpt: Exploring how dignity in labor transforms communities and builds self-reliance.

article2.title: The Power of People Against Poverty
article2.excerpt: Community-led initiatives are showing remarkable results in the fight against extreme poverty.

article3.title: Driving Force Out of Poverty
article3.excerpt: Education remains the single most effective tool for breaking the cycle of poverty.
